ygData.subject: i need help
ygData.msgSnippet: I am in need of help.  I used to play everquest all the time using a friends username and password until he changed his password and never told me what the new
ygData.messageBody:
I am in need of help. I used to play everquest all the time using a
friends username and password until he changed his password and never
told me what the new one was. I know i am about to ask a stupid
question but is there any way that anyone would let me use their
username and password. I would be very greatful and i would stay off
of the severs you use, and i would help you anyway that i could. I
would get a username and password if i could but i dont have a credit
card. I'm sorry if i have bothered any of you fine gamers but i just
had to ask. and if you will let me use your username and password
email me.



Thank you for taking the time to read this.
